roleset.name: cause to die, murder
roleset.note: KILL-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls murder-42.1-1, subjugate-42.3. (from kill.01-v)
KILLING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to kill.01-v. VN classes murder-42.1-1 and subjugate-42.3. FN class killing. Framed by Katie. (from killing.01-n)
KILL-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to kill.01-v. VN classes murder-42.1-1 and subjugate-42.3. Framed by Katie. (from kill.01-n)

example.name: variant instrument
example.text: ''Ford-1 probably would try *trace*-1 to kill the proposal by enlisting support from U.S. takeover-stock speculators and holding out the carrot of a larger bid later, said Stephen Reitman, European auto analyst at London brokers UBS Phillips& Drew.
example.arg: by enlisting support from U.S. takeover-stock speculators and holding out the carrot of a larger bid later

example.name: normal instrument
example.text: John killed Mary with a lead pipe, in the conservatory.

example.name: with a victim
example.text: the killing of Messrs. Spadafora and Torrijos

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: the killing of officers by their men

example.name: arg m-mnr seems common with this noun
example.text: a hard kill of a process should be used only as a last resort

example.name: inanimate thing killed
example.text: a soft kill of process sdm sap

roleset.name: do well, win, accomplish some task
roleset.note: KILL-V NOTES: Based on Twitter data. Framed by Katie. (from kill.03-v)
KILLING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to succeed.01-v. See VN class succeed-74-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from killing.02-n)

roles.note: Arg 1 isn't fixed, but maybe it should be. (from kill.03-v)

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: CNN is killing it for Haiti

example.name: arg 1
example.text: ABC , for example , made a killing in broadcasting its popular crime/comedy "Moonlighting"

example.name: both args
example.text: Students get 10 weeks and a phantom $100000 to make their killing in the market

roleset.name: pass the time by engaging in some activity
roleset.note: KILL-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from kill.04-v)

example.name: args 0,1
example.text: The current civil servant system is a " system of its own " and has resulted the common occurrences of complacency within the civil servant ranks , some civil servant are not achieving anything , just killing time and wasting their youth .

example.name: all args
example.text: Usually the musicians stopped to grab a bite to eat or killed an hour playing chess.

roleset.name: cause to die
roleset.note: KILL_OFF-V NOTES: See VNcls murder-42.1-1, subjugate-42.3. (from kill.02-v)

example.name: transitive, no instrument
example.text: Such films have killed off the local movie industry.
